name:
Reinforcement
(Castle Military Wing)
description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Upon completion, Cavalry units gain the ability to construct siege weapons.
The House of Wisdom produces 3 Desert Raiders immediately and then every 2 minutes for the rest of the game.

variations.descriptionCN:
建造军事偏殿。
完成后，骑兵单位获得建造攻城武器的能力。
智慧宫立即生产 3 名沙漠掠夺者，并在本局游戏剩余时间内每 2 分钟生产该数量的沙漠掠夺者。
